title: Kalista is NOT meant and never will be meant for SOLO Q.
body:
Kalista was made specifically for DUO's.  you can force her to work in solo Q, but dont cry when your support constantly roams top and bot rendering your ult non existent because you want to stay bot and farm. dont cry when you do finally get the ult your support ults in the complete opposite direction of the enemy team in order to run away rather than use her only hard CC.  dont cry when your support never pokes the enemy laner in order to get her W passive to proc.

the sooner you realize this, the sooner you can stop insta locking kalista.
